channel.title: Random Stuff on VGALTES blog
channel.description: Recent content in Random Stuff on VGALTES blog

item.title: Interesting reads - June 2019
item.description: My good friend Edu Ferro has a very nice blog called eferro’s random stuff in which he posts the most interesting blogs, talks and podcasts he’s read, viewed and heard lately. I like the idea and, now that I have a bit more free time, I’ll try to do the same, at least once every month. I’m not going to post here podcasts and talks, basically because all the ones I listen I get them from Edu’s blog, so I’m just going to concentrate in blogs.
